videoSnippet.title: Grandmaster Loses in 7 Moves! | Candelario vs Rizouk | Batumi Chess Olympiad (2018)
videoSnippet.description:
Follow me on Instagram for extra content: https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Manuel Perez Candelario vs Aimen Rizouk 
43rd Chess Olympiad (2018), rd 7, Oct-1 
Scandinavian Defense (B01)

1. e4 d5 2. exd5 Qxd5 3. Nc3 Qa5 4. Bc4 Nf6 5. d3 c6 6. Qe2 Bf5 7. Bd2 Nbd7 8. Nb5 Qxd2+ 9. Qxd2 cxb5 10. Bxb5 a6 11. Bxd7+ Bxd7 12. Nf3 Bc6 13. Qf4 O-O-O 14. Ne5 Bxg2 15. Rg1 Bd5

On the official website you will find all the basic information and daily reports, results, pairings, and the official press releases: 
http://batumi2018.fide.com/en

Twitter: @BatumiChess2018  (hashtag BatumiChess2018)
Facebook: www.facebook.com/batumi2018

This is the official link â€“ just to have a look or to download!
www.flickr.com/photos/batumichessolympiad/albums

These pictures are provided to you for free as a courtesy from the organizers: please feel free to divulgue them and send them to the newspapers and chess columnists in your respective countries.
